control.description-key: Control for Association (aka joint or N:N) tables

property.name: selectorTable
property.description-key: Name for the Selector Table to show records to choose from in UI. Example: crmvet_table2

property.name: selectorLabel
property.description-key: Logical Name for the Selector Table field to be used as a Label in UI for selector items. Example: crmvet_uilabel

property.name: associationTable
property.description-key: Name for the Association Table (aka N:N Table) where joint/association records are stored. Example: crmvet_table1_table2_association

property.name: associationLable
property.description-key: Logical Name for the Association Table field to be used as a Label in UI for associated items. Example: crmvet_uiassociatedlabel

property.name: lookuptoAssociatedTable
property.description-key: Schema Name of the lookup to the associated/target table in the joint/association table (N:N). Example: crmvet_Table2Id

property.name: lookuptoCurrentTable
property.description-key: Schema Name of the lookup to the current table in the joint/association table (N:N). Example: crmvet_Table1Id

property.name: defaultFilter
property.description-key: Default Filter for Selector Table to define what records would be visible in UI. Example: statuscode eq 1

property.name: visibilityToggle
property.description-key: Show or Hide in UI Selector Values. Useful if due to the number of options PCF takes to much space on a form. Example: Yes/No
